name: Close
function 1
func:

func:
msg.payload = "3,"+String(msg.payload);

name: heating value
func:
msg.payload=msg.payload.values[new Date().getHours()];
return msg;

name: to Text
func:
var heat_table = msg.payload.values;
var txt=
"00:00 - 01-00: "+ heat_table[0].toString() + "\n"+
"01:00 - 02-00: " + heat_table[1].toString() + "\n"+
"02:00 - 03-00: " + heat_table[2].toString() + "\n" +
"03:00 - 04-00: " + heat_table[3].toString() + "\n" +
"04:00 - 05-00: " + heat_table[4].toString() + "\n" +
"05:00 - 06-00: " + heat_table[5].toString() + "\n" +
"06:00 - 07-00: " + heat_table[6].toString() + "\n" +
"07:00 - 08-00: " + heat_table[7].toString() + "\n" +
"08:00 - 09-00: " + heat_table[8].toString() + "\n" +
"09:00 - 10-00: " + heat_table[9].toString() + "\n" +
"10:00 - 11-00: " + heat_table[10].toString() + "\n" +
"11:00 - 12-00: " + heat_table[11].toString() + "\n" +
"12:00 - 13-00: " + heat_table[12].toString() + "\n" +
"13:00 - 14-00: " + heat_table[13].toString() + "\n" +
"14:00 - 15-00: " + heat_table[14].toString() + "\n" +
"15:00 - 16-00: " + heat_table[15].toString() + "\n" +
"16:00 - 17-00: " + heat_table[16].toString() + "\n" +
"17:00 - 18-00: " + heat_table[17].toString() + "\n" +
"18:00 - 19-00: " + heat_table[18].toString() + "\n" +
"19:00 - 20-00: " + heat_table[19].toString() + "\n" +
"20:00 - 21-00: " + heat_table[20].toString() + "\n" +
"21:00 - 22-00: " + heat_table[21].toString() + "\n" +
"22:00 - 23-00: " + heat_table[22].toString() + "\n" +
"23:00 - 00-00: " + heat_table[23].toString() + "\n" 
msg.payload =txt;
return msg;
